title: Prohibition of Cigarette Vending Machines Accessible to Minors in Federal Buildings and Lands Act
content: Prohibition of Cigarette Vending Machines Accessible to Minors in Federal Buildings and Lands Act - Requires promulgation of Federal regulations that prohibit the sale of tobacco products in vending machines and the distribution of free samples of tobacco products: (1) in or around any Federal building under the jurisdiction of the Administrator of General Services or the head of a Federal agency. And (2) in Capitol buildings. Allows exceptions for areas that prohibit the presence of minors.
